page.title: 02ARMY
page.content: Catterik Garrison is the Headquarters of the {Training Group Royal Signals.} The{11th.Signal Regiment}trains the new recruits in military discipline, turning them into soldiers. The{8th.Signal Regiment}is the trade training regiment. The Royal Signals Demonstration Team more widely known as{The White Helmets are also based at Catterick. The Headquarters of the {24th.Infantry {Brigade}is also here. Several Infantry Regiments spend upto a two year tour here. The {Royal Armoured Corp}is stationed here with good training on the moors. {31 Workshop REME and 40 Squadron Royal {Corp of Transport}is based at the Garrison.
